committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on National Parks and Public Lands

official_title: A bill to authorize the National Park Service to acquire up to 3 acres of lands to be used for a visitor site and administrative facilities for the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.

summary.text: Amends the National Parks and Recreation Act of 1978 to authorize the Secretary of the Interior to accept certain lands from the city of Agoura Hills, California, for use as a visitor center and administrative offices for the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the National Park Service to acquire up to 3 acres of lands to be used for a visitor site and administrative facilities for the Santa Monica Mountains National Recreation Area.
